name: Three Jogs
description:
A 3-minute narrative experience about jogging with your dog and the passage of time.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together"

Controls

  • Space to speed up and call your dog
  • Up/Down to change lanes. Avoid mud.

Audio

  • Four Seasons recording by John Harrison
  • November by Ben Sounds
  • Various SFX from http://freesoundeffect.net/ and Universal Sound FX
